plain: Based on the user's favourite movies, it can be inferred that their favourite genre is comedy, their favourite kind of plot is quirky and unconventional, their favourite kind of musical score is upbeat and energetic, their favourite mood for the musical score is lighthearted and fun, their favourite setting is modern-day suburban America, their favourite visual style is vibrant and colourful, their favourite writing style is witty and satirical, their favourite runtime is around 90 minutes, and their favourite themes are relationships, self-discovery, and the human condition.
